transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello sir, ek cheez mujhe batao aapki service aapne pehle ek cheez samajhna sir, leading supplier ke sath mein aapko trust seal milta hai, theek hai?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji. Yes, leading supplier maine bataya tha leading supplier ke sath aapko trust seal milega. Aapko kitni abhi leading supplier live nahi hui hai, right? Jis din se live hogi us din se aage 13 mahine chalenge. Ek mahine aapki services free of cost chali hai trust seal. Chali hai na sir? Fees ke bihaf mein because aapne humse leading supplier liya. Right?
Customer: Ji. Isi wajah se to humne diya. Us paisa ka jo aapne 140 diya hai abhi uska utilization to abhi tak ho nahi paya hai because hamara leading supplier live nahi hua hai, right?
Customer: Bilkul sahi baat hai. Aap mujhe batao humne isme kaha galat kara? Even aapko to jyada benefit mil raha hai. Matlab pichle ek mahine se aapko jyada benefit mil raha hai. Aapko trust seal ho gaya but mujhe MDC nahi karna chahiye tha.
Executive: Sir, MDC isiliye band hui hai because balance payment nahi aayi hai. Humne pure MDC aapne puri jo deal banayi hai wo part payment ki banayi to MDC ka bhi to part payment ho gaya na sir phir?
Executive: Aur humne us according to IndiaMART ko puri hi band kar deni chahiye thi but phir bhi IndiaMART aapko saat lead de rahi hai. Wo rakh lijiye aap, wo nahi chahiye mujhe, wo lead nahi chahiye mujhe ab. Wo saat lead bhi aap rakh lijiye main uska kya karunga? Sir, to uske bihaf mein aapko abhi jo 34 leads mil rahi thi tab to aapne nahi bola jab IndiaMART aapko jyada de rahi hai tab to aapne ek baar bhi nahi kaha ki acha ye batao mujhe 34 leads kyun mil rahi hai? Mam maine paise diye the, mere paise diye hue the. Jyada kaha mil rahi hai?
Executive: Sir, to phir wahi cheez sir leading supplier aapki service live hui? Nahi live hui. Without live hue ab aapko sirf itna aap se maine request kara hai ki mam next monday mein karwaunga aap baat kar lo. Aapne baat kari?
Executive: Bilkul baat kari wo nahi possible ho sakta hai na. Maine us din bhi aapko mana kar diya tha. Maine bola ki is din ka approval mil sakta hai aap batao to main live kara du.
Customer: Is din mein baat nahi banegi na. Hamare yaha koi shadi wadi chal rahi hai uske chakkar mein. Aur aap bhi jante ho sir balance payment ki maine baat aap se clearly kahi thi ki mujhe 30 October ko chahiye hi hoga sir. Bola tha ya nahi aap batao mujhe.
Customer: Aapne mujhe agar thoda sa mujhe 10 din pehle is cheez ko bol diya hota na main usi hisab se leke chalta. Setting. Mujhe pata nahi tha ki is tarah hoga.
Executive: Sir maine bola tha aapko usse kuch bhi fark nahi padta hai. Aap dhyan hi kyun de rahe ho is baat ko. Aap is baat pe dhyan de rahe the ki mere ko to Diwali ke baad apni services live karani hai.
Executive: Bola tha aapne hi bola tha sir Diwali ke baad service live karani hai. Us chakkar mein sari deal cancel ho gayi usko dobara se hume banana pada.
Customer: Chaliye theek hai. Kal mere brother aate hai unke sath chalte hai phir baat. Kal baat aaunga abhi main apne brother aayenge mere kal ghar mein bahar main baat karke batata hu. To brother se aane se to brothers ka kya kaam sir isme business to aapka hai na?
Customer: Nahi brother kya nahi hai brother bhi hai.
Executive: Ye proprietor hai na sir?
Customer: Haan proprietor to hai lekin mere sab kuch matlab wo hota hai aap samjhenge nahi.
Executive: Nahi last time payment ke time aisa koi discussion hua nahi sir sir na ki kisi brother se. Nahi ji wo to hamari jaise family wali baat hai hum kya discuss nahi kar sakte kya family se? Nahi nahi bilkul discuss kar sakte hai last time jab payment ke time pe koi discussion nahi hui na to wahi main samajh rahi thi. Nahi nahi maine unse bhi unse discuss hi karke kara tha kaam.
Customer: Chal anyway us cheez ki baat nahi hai bhai baat baat bhai ki bhi nahi hai baat ye hai ki bhai arrangement karni hai kis tarah kya kare main dekhta hu baat karta hu main theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Kal baat kar lijiye mujhe call karo sir.
Customer: Kal 12 baje tak.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai. Thank you. Number kya hai bhai aapka number?
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants MDC to be active.

- Customer says he is not getting enough leads.

- Customer says he was not informed about payment.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the reason for MDC suspension.

- Executive explained about trust seal benefits.

- Executive clarified about balance payment.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- mdc, buyleads, payment, trustseal
